creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: inside wooden box with inscription on inside and outside of lid; resting on tissue; paper around roller inside tie; fabric is light grey with geometric floral in blue; image is of black wash with red bamboo; inscription in yellow along R edge
markings: poem UR red seal: 无心 {mushin} [mushin #2]; LL red seals: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #1], 静處 {seisho} [seisho #1]; bottom center: 我君〇〇〇〇 [unread #1]
title: Bamboo in Snow
